question: Which course is more difficult, Intro to BlockChain or Computer Network?
query: SELECT name FROM course WHERE name = 'Intro to BlockChain' OR name = 'Computer Network' ORDER BY diff DESC LIMIT 1

question: Please list the names of the courses that are less important than Machine Learning Theory.
query: SELECT name FROM course WHERE credit < ( SELECT credit FROM course WHERE name = 'Machine Learning Theory' )

question: How many professors are more popular than Zhou Zhihua?
query: SELECT COUNT(prof_id) FROM prof WHERE popularity > ( SELECT popularity FROM prof WHERE first_name = 'Zhihua' AND last_name = 'Zhou' )

question: What is the phone number of Kerry Pryor?
query: SELECT phone_number FROM student WHERE l_name = 'Pryor' AND f_name = 'Kerry'

question: Which professor advised Faina Mallinar to become a research assistant? Please give his or her full name.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.f_name = 'Faina' AND T3.l_name = 'Mallinar'

question: How many research assistants does Sauveur Skyme have?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Sauveur' AND T2.last_name = 'Skyme'

question: Please list the full names of all the students who are research assistants with the highest research capability.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.capability = 5

question: How many research assistants of Ogdon Zywicki have an average salary?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.prof_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Ogdon' AND T1.salary = 'med' AND T2.last_name = 'Zywicki'

question: Please list the full names of all the students who took the course Machine Learning Theory.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Machine Learning Theory'

question: Among the students who got a B in the course Machine Learning Theory, how many of them have a gpa of over 3?
query: SELECT COUNT(student_id) FROM registration WHERE grade = 'B' AND student_id IN ( SELECT student_id FROM student WHERE gpa > 3 AND course_id IN ( SELECT course_id FROM course WHERE name = 'Machine Learning Theory' ) )

question: Please list the names of the courses taken by Laughton Antonio.
query: SELECT T3.name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.f_name = 'Laughton' AND T1.l_name = 'Antonio'

question: Which student failed the course Intro to Database 2? Please give his or her full name.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T2.grade IS NULL AND T3.name = 'Intro to Database 2'

question: Which student is more satisfied with the course Machine Learning Theory, Willie Rechert or Laughton Antonio?
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE (T1.f_name = 'Laughton' OR T1.f_name = 'Willie') AND (T1.l_name = 'Antonio' OR T1.l_name = 'Rechert') AND T3.name = 'Machine Learning Theory' ORDER BY T2.sat DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the professors who have more than 3 research assistants, how many of them are male?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT T2.prof_id FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.gender = 'Male' GROUP BY T1.prof_id HAVING COUNT(T1.student_id) > 3 )

question: Among the students who took the course Machine Learning Theory, how many of them are undergraduates?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Machine Learning Theory' AND T1.type = 'UG'

question: Which professor advised Willie Rechert to work as a research assistant? Please give his or her full name.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.f_name = 'Willie' AND T3.l_name = 'Rechert'

question: What is the average gpa of Ogdon Zywicki's research assistants?
query: SELECT SUM(T3.gpa) / COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T1.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Ogdon' AND T2.last_name = 'Zywicki'

question: What is the average satisfying degree of the course Machine Learning Theory?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.sat) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.name = 'Machine Learning Theory'

question: Give the number of research postgraduate students.
query: SELECT COUNT(student_id) FROM student WHERE type = 'RPG'

question: Which student has the highest gpa? Give the full name.
query: SELECT f_name, l_name FROM student WHERE gpa = ( SELECT MAX(gpa) FROM student )

question: For the 3-credit course with the easiest difficulty, how many students get an "A" in that course?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T1.grade = 'A' AND T2.credit = '3' AND T2.diff = 1

question: How many students took the hardest course?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.diff = 5

question: Which professor is Oliy Spratling working with? Give the full name.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.f_name = 'Oliy' AND T3.l_name = 'Spratling'

question: For the professor who is working with Harrietta Lydford, how is his popularity?
query: SELECT T1.popularity FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.f_name = 'Harrietta' AND T3.l_name = 'Lydford'

question: How many research assistants does the female professor with the lowest teaching ability have?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.teachingability = '1' AND T2.gender = 'Female'

question: For the professors who advise more than 2 students, which professor has a higher teaching ability? Give the full name.
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name, T2.teachingability FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id GROUP BY T1.prof_id HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 2 ) T ORDER BY T.teachingability DESC LIMIT 1

question: Give the grade score for Rik Unsworth in "Computer Network".
query: SELECT CASE grade WHEN 'A' THEN 4 WHEN 'B' THEN 3 WHEN 'C' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS result FROM registration WHERE student_id IN ( SELECT student_id FROM student WHERE f_name = 'Rik' AND l_name = 'Unsworth' AND course_id IN ( SELECT course_id FROM course WHERE name = 'Computer Network' ) )

question: How many courses does Alvera McQuillin take?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.course_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.f_name = 'Alvera' AND T2.l_name = 'McQuillin'

question: State the name of research postgraduate student among Professor Zhihua Zhou's research assistants.
query: SELECT T3.f_name, T3.l_name FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Zhihua' AND T3.type = 'RPG' AND T1.last_name = 'Zhou'

question: Provide the number of students enrolled in the "Statistical Learning" course.
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.student_id) FROM course AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T1.name = 'Statistical learning'

question: Who were the students who failed the course "Applied Deep Learning"? Give the full name.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Applied Deep Learning ' AND T2.grade IS NULL

question: Give the phone number of the only student who obtained "A" in the course "Intro to BlockChain".
query: SELECT T1.phone_number FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Intro to BlockChain' AND T2.grade = 'A'

question: What is the percentage of Professor Ogdon Zywicki's research assistants are taught postgraduate students?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T3.type = 'TPG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T1.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Ogdon' AND T2.last_name = 'Zywicki'

question: What is the percentage of students who get a "B" in the course "Computer Network"?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.grade = 'B' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.name = 'Computer Network'

question: How many courses have the highest difficulty?
query: SELECT COUNT(course_id) FROM course WHERE diff = 5

question: What is the full name of the professor who graduated from an Ivy League School?
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM prof WHERE graduate_from IN ( 'Brown University',  'Columbia University',  'Cornell University',  'Dartmouth College',  'Harvard University',  'Princeton University',  'University of Pennsylvania',  'Yale University' )

question: Among the most important courses, what is the name of the most difficult course?
query: SELECT name FROM course WHERE credit = ( SELECT MAX(credit) FROM course ) AND diff = ( SELECT MAX(diff) FROM course )

question: How many students have the highest intelligence among those taking a bachelor's degree?
query: SELECT COUNT(student_id) FROM student WHERE type = 'UG' AND intelligence = ( SELECT MAX(intelligence) FROM student )

question: Among the most popular professors, how many are females?
query: SELECT COUNT(prof_id) FROM prof WHERE gender = 'Female' AND popularity = ( SELECT MAX(popularity) FROM prof )

question: How many research postgraduate students are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(student_id) FROM student WHERE type = 'RPG'

question: How many students got an A in Applied Deep Learning?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.student_id) FROM course AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.grade = 'A' AND T1.name = 'Applied Deep Learning '

question: What are the GPAs of the unpaid Research Assistants?
query: SELECT T2.gpa FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.salary = 'free'

question: Among the easiest courses, what is the name of the course where most students got an A?
query: SELECT T2.name FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T1.grade = 'A' AND T2.diff = 1 GROUP BY T2.name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.student_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many courses does the student with the highest GPA this semester take?
query: SELECT COUNT(course_id) FROM registration WHERE student_id IN ( SELECT student_id FROM student WHERE gpa = ( SELECT MAX(gpa) FROM student ) )

question: How many students does Ogdon Zywicki advise?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Ogdon' AND T2.last_name = 'Zywicki'

question: What is the name of the course with the highest satisfaction from students?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.name FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T1.sat = 5

question: What are the names of the courses that the students with the lowest intelligence are least satisfied with?
query: SELECT T3.name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T2.sat = 1 AND T1.intelligence = 1

question: Which of the two courses, "Advanced Operating System" or "Intro to BlockChain', did most of the students receive an A in?
query: SELECT T2.name FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T1.grade = 'A' AND T2.name IN ('Advanced Operating System', 'Intro to BlockChain') GROUP BY T2.name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.student_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the popularity of the professor who advises the highest number of students with the highest research ability?
query: SELECT T2.popularity FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id GROUP BY T1.prof_id, T1.capability ORDER BY COUNT(T1.student_id) DESC, T1.capability DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the average number of students who registered for the courses with a difficulty of 4?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(T1.student_id) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT T2.course_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.diff = 4

question: How many students, who have a GPA between 3 to 4, failed a course?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.student_id) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.grade IS NULL AND T1.gpa BETWEEN 3 AND 4

question: How many students taking a bachelor's degree received an A in all of the courses that they took?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.student_id) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.grade = 'A' AND T1.type = 'UG'

question: What is the average GPA of the students with the highest research capability and high salary? List the full names of the students.
query: SELECT AVG(T2.gpa), T2.f_name, T2.l_name FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.salary = 'high' AND T1.capability = 5 GROUP BY T2.student_id

question: List the professors' IDs and students' IDs with the lowest research ability.
query: SELECT prof_id, student_id FROM RA WHERE capability = ( SELECT MIN(capability) FROM RA )

question: Name the professor who got graduation from the University of Boston.
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM prof WHERE graduate_from = 'University of Boston'

question: List the courses' IDs and students' IDs who failed to pass the course.
query: SELECT course_id, student_id FROM registration WHERE grade IS NULL OR grade = ''

question: What is the male and female ratio among the professors?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'Male' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'Female' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM prof

question: Describe the names and credits of the least difficult courses.
query: SELECT name, credit FROM course WHERE diff = ( SELECT MIN(diff) FROM course )

question: Describe the students' full names and GPAs under the supervision of the most popular professor.
query: SELECT T3.f_name, T3.l_name, T3.gpa FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id ORDER BY T1.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: Provide the full names and emails of unpaid research assistants.
query: SELECT T2.f_name, T2.l_name, T2.email FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.salary = 'free'

question: List the research assistants' full names, capabilities and GPAs who were under the supervision of Merwyn Conkay.
query: SELECT T3.f_name, T3.l_name, T2.capability, T3.gpa FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Merwyn' AND T1.last_name = 'Conkay'

question: Describe the students' full names and grades in Intro to BlockChain course.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name, T2.grade FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Intro to BlockChain'

question: Among students registered for the most difficult course, list the students' full names who got grade A.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T2.grade = 'A' ORDER BY T3.diff DESC LIMIT 1

question: Describe the full names and graduated universities of the professors who advised Olia Rabier.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, T1.graduate_from FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.f_name = 'Olia' AND T3.l_name = 'Rabier'

question: Name the students of the Advanced Database Systems course with the highest satisfaction.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Advanced Database Systems' ORDER BY T2.sat DESC LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the GPA of the semester for Laughton Antonio.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T3.credit * CASE T1.grade WHEN 'A' THEN 4 WHEN 'B' THEN 3 WHEN 'C' THEN 2 WHEN 'D' THEN 1 ELSE 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(T3.credit) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T1.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T2.f_name = 'Laughton' AND T2.l_name = 'Antonio'

question: Provide the registered courses' names by undergraduate students with GPA of 3.7 and above.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.f_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.type = 'UG' AND T1.gpa > 3.7

question: Describe the names and capability of the students who were advised by professors from the University of Washington.
query: SELECT T3.f_name, T3.l_name, T2.capability FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T1.graduate_from = 'University of Washington'

question: Describe the full names, emails and intelligence of the students with the highest capability and salary.
query: SELECT f_name, l_name, email, intelligence FROM student WHERE student_id IN ( SELECT student_id FROM RA WHERE salary = 'high' AND capability = ( SELECT MAX(capability) FROM RA ) )

question: Mention the names and credits of course registered by the students who were under the supervision of female professor with the highest teaching ability.
query: SELECT T5.name, T5.credit FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T1.student_id = T3.student_id INNER JOIN registration AS T4 ON T3.student_id = T4.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T5 ON T4.course_id = T5.course_id WHERE T2.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY T2.teachingability DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many of the professors are female?
query: SELECT COUNT(prof_id) FROM prof WHERE gender = 'Female'

question: What is the name of the most difficult course?
query: SELECT name FROM course WHERE diff = ( SELECT MAX(diff) FROM course )

question: Among the students with a gpa of 3.1 to 3.7, how many of them are undergraduate students?
query: SELECT COUNT(student_id) FROM student WHERE gpa BETWEEN 3.1 AND 3.7 AND type = 'UG'

question: What is the credit of the course named "Computer Vision"?
query: SELECT credit FROM course WHERE name = 'Computer Vision'

question: Give the student's ID of students with 2.5 GPA and enrolled in C for Programmers.
query: SELECT T2.student_id FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'C for Programmers' AND T1.gpa = 2.5

question: Give the student's last name that gave the highest student satisfaction for the course "Intro to Database 2".
query: SELECT T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Intro to Database 2' ORDER BY T2.sat DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the students with high salary, what is total number of students with a GPA higher than 3?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.salary = 'high' AND T2.gpa > 3

question: Among undergraduate students, list the name of the course with the highest student satisfaction.
query: SELECT T3.name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.type = 'UG' ORDER BY T2.sat DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the capability of research postgraduate students with an intellegence level of 4 and above.
query: SELECT T1.capability FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.type = 'RPG' AND T2.intelligence >= 4

question: In students with a grade of B, how many of them have an intellegence level of 3?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.grade = 'B' AND T2.intelligence = 3

question: What is the difficulty of the course in which a student with level of intellengence of 5 got an A grade?
query: SELECT T3.diff FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T2.grade = 'A' AND T1.intelligence = 5

question: Among professors with the highest popularity, how many of their students have research capability of 5?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T1.capability = 5 ORDER BY T2.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the course's name where students acquired a grade of D.
query: SELECT T1.name FROM course AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.grade = 'D'

question: What is the capability on research of the student named Alvera McQuillin?
query: SELECT T2.capability FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.f_name = 'Alvera' AND T1.l_name = 'McQuillin'

question: Of courses with 3 credit, how many students have GPA of 3.2?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.credit = 3 AND T1.gpa = 3.2

question: Among students with low salary, how many of them have a gpa of 3.5?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.gpa = 3.5 AND T1.salary = 'low'

question: List the student's email with grade of B in a course with difficulty greater than the 80% of average difficulty of all courses.
query: SELECT T2.email FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T1.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.grade = 'B' GROUP BY T3.diff HAVING T3.diff > AVG(T3.diff) * 0.8

question: Among the professors with a teachability of 3 and below, what is the percentage of their student advisees with a low salary?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.salary = 'low' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.salary) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.teachingability < 3

question: Find the most important and most difficult courses.
query: SELECT name FROM course WHERE credit = ( SELECT MAX(credit) FROM course ) AND diff = ( SELECT MAX(diff) FROM course )

question: What is the average teaching ability of the most popular professors?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(teachingability) AS REAL) / COUNT(prof_id) FROM prof WHERE popularity = ( SELECT MAX(popularity) FROM prof )

question: Calculate the average satisfaction of the good students with their courses.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(sat) AS REAL) / COUNT(course_id) FROM registration WHERE grade = 'B'

question: Among the students with less than four intelligence, list the full name and phone number of students with a greater than 3 GPA.
query: SELECT f_name, l_name, phone_number FROM student WHERE gpa > 3 AND intelligence < 4

question: Name the students with above-average capability.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.capability > ( SELECT AVG(capability) FROM RA )

question: For the students with an intelligence of 5, list the full name and courses taken by them who have less than a 3 GPA.
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name, T3.name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.intelligence = 5 AND T1.gpa < 3

question: What is the average capability of students with less than a 2.5 GPA?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.capability) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.gpa < 2.5

question: List the full name of the professors who advised students with intelligence 1.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.intelligence = 1

question: What is the difference in the average GPA of students who took the hardest and easiest courses?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.gpa) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.diff IN (2, 1) GROUP BY T3.diff

question: Give the full name and capability of students who failed in any courses.
query: SELECT T2.f_name, T2.l_name, T1.capability FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T2.student_id = T1.student_id INNER JOIN registration AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.grade IS NULL OR T3.grade = ''

question: Of the students with high salaries, how many took the computer vision course?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T2.student_id = T1.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.salary = 'high' AND T3.name = 'Computer Vision'

question: Find the full name and popularity of the professor who advises the most number of students.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, T1.popularity FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id GROUP BY T1.prof_id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.student_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Please give the name of the course in which most numbers of the students got an A. Also, list the full name of the students who got an A in this course.
query: SELECT T3.name, T2.f_name, T2.l_name FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T1.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T1.grade = 'A' GROUP BY T3.name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.student_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the difference between the average satisfaction of the students with high salaries and no salary.
query: SELECT AVG(T2.sat) - ( SELECT AVG(T2.sat) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.salary = 'free' ) AS diff FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.salary = 'high'

question: Find the university from which the professor who advised most undergraduate students graduated.
query: SELECT T1.graduate_from FROM prof AS T1 INNER JOIN RA AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id INNER JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.student_id = T3.student_id WHERE T3.type = 'UG' GROUP BY T1.prof_id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.student_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the professors with more than average teaching ability, list the full name and email address of the professors who advise two or more students.
query: SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name, T2.email FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T2.teachingability > ( SELECT AVG(teachingability) FROM prof ) GROUP BY T2.prof_id HAVING COUNT(T1.student_id) >= 2

question: What percentage of students are highly satisfied with the Intro to Database 2 course?
query: SELECT CAST(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course WHERE name = 'Intro to Database 2' AND course_id IN ( SELECT course_id FROM registration WHERE sat = ( SELECT MAX(sat) FROM registration ) ) ) AS REAL) * 100  / COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM registration AS T1 INNER JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id WHERE T2.name = 'Intro to Database 2'

question: What is the first and last name of students with highest gpa?
query: SELECT f_name, l_name FROM student WHERE gpa = ( SELECT MAX(gpa) FROM student )

question: Among professors with the highest teachability, how many of their students have high salary?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN prof AS T2 ON T1.prof_id = T2.prof_id WHERE T1.salary = 'high' ORDER BY T2.teachingability DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the salary range of the student with an email of grosellg@hku.hk?
query: SELECT T1.salary FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T2.email = 'grosellg@hku.hk'

question: Among students that gave satisfaction of value 4 for the course named "Statistical Learning", how many of them have a gpa of 3.8?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Statistical learning' AND T2.sat = 4 AND T1.gpa = 3.8

question: Among courses with difficulty of 3, how many students have intellegence level of 2?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.student_id) FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.diff = 3 AND T1.intelligence = 2

question: List the student's first and last name that got a C in the course named "Applied Deep Learning".
query: SELECT T1.f_name, T1.l_name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T3.name = 'Applied Deep Learning ' AND T2.grade = 'C'

question: Among research postgraduate students, give the name of the course with the student satisfaction value of 1.
query: SELECT T3.name FROM student AS T1 INNER JOIN registration AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id INNER JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id WHERE T2.sat = 1 AND T1.type = 'RPG'

question: Among the students with a capability below 3, what is the difference of undergraduate students from research postgraduate students?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.type = 'UG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T2.type = 'RPG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM RA AS T1 INNER JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id WHERE T1.capability < 3
